Title: Muerte: Tales of Horror
Writer: Christopher Ambriz, Michelle Banks, Jessica Lee Golden, Jo Valarie Gonzalez, Norman Navarro
Actors: Jessica Lee Golden, Aileen Corpos, Gil Oteen, Katie Loftin
Plot: A collection of films from Night Creature Productions centering around a stolen comic book full of tales that come to life to haunt the people that wrongfully stole it. Features short films The Date, The Night Before, El Cucuy and Pen.
